page.title: 01General Review _ Leck area
page.content: This area is in the parishes of Leck, Whittington, and Tunstall. It lies in the Lune valley and is predominantly a farming area. It includes the villages of Cowan Bridge and Whittington and the smaller hamlets of Overtown and Burrow. The landscape is quite hilly and most farms are mixed rather than specialised, averaging about 100 to 150 acres each. All the villages and hamlets have lower populations than in the past and the viability of schools, shops, churches, bus-services etc.is a constant worry. There is very little industry other than the Sheepskin Warehouse company, several haulage firms, builders, and joiners. Ironically a growth in the tourist industry has adversely affected the area for the growing number of holiday cottages means fewer full-time inhabitants.
